thread.title: BRIEF-Aaron's reports Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share of $0.65

title: BRIEF-Aaron's reports Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share of $0.65
text: February 15, 2018 / 12:23 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Aaron's reports Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share of $0.65 Reuters Staff Feb 15 (Reuters) - Aaron’s Inc: * AARON‘S, INC. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR END 2017 RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.46 * Q4 REVENUE $884.6 MILLION VERSUS $795 MILLION * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.65 * SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.20 TO $3.50 * SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.90 TO $3.20 * SEES 2018 REVENUES OF $3.68 BILLION TO $3.89 BILLION * SEES 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF $70 MILLION TO $90 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.55, REVENUE VIEW $869.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.23, REVENUE VIEW $3.66 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE REFLECTS A PROVISIONAL NET BENEFIT OF $137 MILLION DUE TO TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
